subject: Order #SSN4838
description_text:

I hope you are doing well.

Cumprimentos,

conversations.body_text: Hi Vitor Teixeira,  We apologize for the delay in shipping to our partner. The original estimated date was the 15th, but it has now been adjusted to the 20th. Rest assured, all products are ready and will be shipped as soon as they pass quality inspection.

No problem, thank you for the update.

Cumprimentos,
Vítor Teixeira
